hymn.title: Deep down into the depths of this Thy Name
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Name

layout.singingstanza: Deep down in -- to the depths of this Thy Name, My God, I sink and dwell in calm de -- light; Thou art e -- nough how -- ev -- er long the day, Thou art e -- nough how -- ev -- er dark the night.

lyrics.stanza: Deep down into the depths of this Thy Name, My God, I sink and dwell in calm delight; Thou art enough however long the day, Thou art enough however dark the night.
Thou art my God—the All-Sufficient One, Thou canst create for me whate'er I lack; Thy mighty hand has strewn the lonely track With miracles of love and tender care
For me Thy trusting one. My God I dare Once more to fling myself upon Thy breast, And there adore Thy ways in faith's deep rest, And there adore Thy ways in faith's quiet rest.
